text: Are template previews no longer publicly accessible?

So from the Design Manager, clicking preview and selecting "preview without display options" opens the preview in a new tab. Typically we're able to use that URL to share the preview with our QA team, but now they're being required to log in to HubSpot every time they try the link
<@U26BLKGE4> You can replace the preview.hs-sites portion of the url with `{hubID}.<http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com>`
